I think this might be the first time I’ve been compelled to write a review. I love the Overwatch IP but I can’t bring myself to support Blizzard any longer. I was really excited this afternoon when I saw that the story content got released. I purchased it, decided to play a few matches and realized that the game isn’t even going to function properly. At this point alarms are sounding so I decide to go online and see some opinions on the content I’ve paid and downloaded, let’s just say it’s heavily scaled down from what was originally promised. I knew when I bought it it was non-refundable but I wanted to see the reason. It’s because it’s a “consumable” item, this is because they’ve bundled in some currency with the Invasion DLC just so you can’t refund it. Enough is enough for me, I’m out.
我曾经很爱你，但还是回不去了，难道不是吗？

чтобы войти в аккаунт нужен аутентификатор, а он на старом телефоне, ты заряжаешь старый телефон сбрасываешь на нем аутентификатор, заходишь на новом телефоне в приложение, у тебя просит резервный код восстановления, который можно узнать после входа в аутентификатор = в аккаунт больше не войти. игра настолько хуевая, что в нее невозможно поиграть. а безопасность твоего аккаунта в этой помойке настолько ахуенная, что даже владелец не может войти.

考迪克你知道吗，我们中国有句古话叫
笔扬得万义，驰诗构东西
有首诗叫《诗经·彼阳》
彼阳若至，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霂涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。

[b] 同樣的夏天 一樣的暑假 當初還是鬥陣1時 6v6玩得很開心 當時也們有角色限制 還記得當初6個隊友全是壁壘機兵大家架在護送車上瘋狂輸出 但後來換電腦之後就再也沒玩過了 直到這個暑假再把暴雪帳號找回來 想回憶當初的快樂 但似乎變了卻又沒變 當初的6v6被改成了5v5,也有了角色限制 在也不能像當初一樣了 連之前任務獎勵的箱子也被拔掉了 玩起來也少了許多樂趣 看到2在steam上發布 我想著趕緊下載 發布負評 當初夏天時的回憶以及快樂就像這篇負評發出去一樣 回不去了 這樣也不錯 讓1在我心中始終是快樂的回憶  [/b]

I used to be a huge Overwatch fan, but look at how they massacred my boy.
I'm sure I don't need to elaborate as to why Overwatch 2 is a disappoint of a sequel that is ran by a greedy company who promised us a wildly replayable hero shooter with so much replay value in the form of an expansive PVE mode.

Overwatch at its core is still fun, the PVP is still good. However a large chunk of heroes are locked behind the paywall that is the premium battle pass, making he game, in some circumstances, pay to win. The balancing is also all over the place, with new characters like Sojourn completely dominating the competitive scene for MONTHS until Blizzard finally stepped up and did something about it. Blizzard can't seem to update the PVP to be a fun, fair, and balanced experience. Sometime's they'd overtune characters to be the strongest in the game, other times they'd completely gut characters making them absolutely useless. It also does not help that currently the best way to play is in quickplay. The competitive ranking system is absolutely horrible in that top 500 players are stomping  people in gold.

Now onto the PVE, the coveted game mode that was meant to be the entire crux of Overwatch 2 before shifting to a live service model PVE/PVP experience. we *were* promised a highly expansive PVE experience with hundreds of missions, skill trees, and so much more. But what we got was a very mediocre experience that is over in about 2 hours and has absolutely no staying power, all with the low low price tag of 15 dollars! Chances are you'll play it once, maybe twice, then never play it again.

TL:DR:
Overwatch 2 is an insult to the gaming community. Backed by lies and false promises the game has, and continues, to suffer. The game still has capacity to be good, I want to like this game, but between the egregious monetization, inconsistent PVP, awful ranking system, and the extremely disappointing PVE, it's hard to get excited about the game anymore.
不必多言。
